Text:
Srila Prabhupada's mission
SHARE THIS What better way to get his blessings
Pranaams & peace.

Srila Prabhupada teaches us, that there is no need for any mental speculation or intellectual adjustment while chanting hare krsna, hare krsna, krsna krsna, hare hare, hare rama, hare rama, rama rama, hare hare.
